ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We would like to thank Dr. Ted Pierson (NIAID) for the sub-genomic GFP expressing WNV replicon plasmids, Dr. Frank Scholle (NC State Univ.) for the WNV NS2B-3 protease plasmid, NIH AIDS Reagent Program for the php-dl-NA and pNLLucR-E- plasmids, and Brandy Russell (CDC, Fort Collins, Colorado) for kindly providing the CHIKV immune sera. We would also like to thank BEI resources for the ZIKV, YFV and JEV immune sera and the TTUHSC-El Paso LARC services for help with animal experiments.
